experience_0_overview: Being part of an agile development team that focuses on building quality software for different clients of the company. Constantly working on the implementation of features that involve working with FrondEnd technologies such as Quasar, Vue, JavaScript, TypeScript and BackEnd technologies such as NodeJS/Express, C#, ASP.NET Core and SQL server and Oracle databases. I emphasize that it supports an internal project in which it is possible to automate the development of the maintainers, which greatly speeds up the coding times of the different projects. It was also possible to implement pipelines to automate deployments with GitLab CI/CD and automated tests with Jest.
experience_1_job: Technical leader and full stack developer
experience_1_overview: Being part of the development of a scalable vehicle rental system for one of the companies that makes up Grupo Firma, with the main functions of analyzing, estimating, designing and coding the system, which allowed working with Front End technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript , jQuery, PHP, Codeigniter, Angular and Back End technologies such as Node.js/Express, using Mysql database with ORM Sequelize. Applying good practices and architecture patterns such as DDD and that facilitate the reuse and maintenance of the system. It was possible to automate the tests with Jest/Supertest and the deployment of the systems with GitHub actions. I was also a Technical Leader in charge of proposing improvements and leading the development team for system maintenance.
projects_1_overview: System that manages users, profiles, menu, permissions and event log
projects_2_overview: Real-time monitoring project for public transport
projects_3_overview: Vehicle rental system for Rent a Car company
